website_summaries.verdict: A multitasking option that keeps food fresh and close at hand while offering all the benefits of an elevated feeding bowl.
pros: Whether you're short on storage space or simply like the idea of a more streamlined feeding system, this 2-in-1 design is a solid choice
Airtight container does a good job of keeping kibble fresh and offers extra height at the same time
Stainless steel bowls are easy to clean
cons: Water can accumulate in the top compartment, and may require occasional wiping or drying

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm yea
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m not sure not how to fill about this product. I’m happy my dog can stress less on his joints. But the fact is the sticker on the box said made in America and the bowls say made in India. The first order the plastic cake smashed. Showing me that the plastic isn’t going to hold up well during travel. I’m unsure of what the bowls are made of until I do some more research. Because of the potential chemicals etc that could leach to my dogs water and food. I expect more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: posted some pictures..
customer_reviews.text: great product my dog doesn't hurt hes neck and back bones by reaching too low ..It's stores a lot of dog food ,my white german shepherd loves it perfect size for him..:)Its darker than the original photo so I posted some pictures..:)
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold 47 lbs like advertised, much smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Incorrectly advertised!!! It says it holds up to 47 lbs of dog food, I have a Great Dane puppy so I thought this would be a godsend, it doesn't even hold 30 lbs of dog food. I've tried and tried and rechecked and it wont even hold one full bag of dog food. Its sturdy like its made well, but the food bowls are pretty small for what you would think a "large" feeder would be and it does not do what it says it does. Gave it two stars instead of one because it arrived on time and is sturdy. Other than that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: So Well Made! Keeps Floors Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted Neater Feeders for our three messy dogs. But at $60 each, I couldn't afford to get 3. These were half the price and have more to offer than a Neater Feeder! 1. Because you can store food inside, dogs can't move them or tip them over... Making your floors pet food free. 2. These are PERFECT for travel. You can store food and bowls inside the airtight container and take it with you on the go. 3. We bought Larges for our St. Bernard and Labrador, and a medium for our Doxle. All were the perfect size. UPDATE: I was so impressed with these I bought more as gifts. The recipients love them as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Mel From STL

customer_reviews.title: I love this product because of the scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because of the scale. The amount of dog food stored within the container is correlated to the approximate height of the dog and their food needs. For example, I have an 86lb Great Dane/Rhodesian Ridgeback mix who eats 35-40lbs of kibble a month. That is just slightly less than the amount of food this thing holds. It's crazy convenient. Additionally, the bowls are great quality, light weight, and the perfect size for my dog. The only weird thing is that the clips on the side open upward and I'm used to rubbermaid bins with clips that open downward and I get confused sometimes. That's life
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: IRIS Small Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
customer_reviews.text: Product is great height for our large dog to eat and drink from. Now the little dog can't jump up and eat food out of the other dogs food bowl. Did this before and ended up in the Doggie ER in the middle of the night with bloated stomach, cost $800 to keep her overnight with ads and 1/2 day next day. But the little Yorkie (piglet) tried to get into the new bowl again, but its elevated higher and she can't get her face in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one place and still compact size!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am in love with this! It holds 35 lbs of dry dog food easily and I would guess would hold 40 lbs. I was going to use a plastic tote and set my dogs bowels on top, this is a nice height, is unobtrusive, pretty compact for what it holds and I don't have to worry about the bowls getting nudged off the top of it! So long as Mr. persistent doesn't figure out how to nose the latches for the top up and get into the food I think this is about perfect for my needs. So far Very happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer, happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: I love this elevated feeder! My dog would push around her old bowls, causing water spills and splashes, but not anymore! The dog food in the bottom weighs it down so that doesn’t happen. Plus it’s just very sturdy. She loves not having to bend down so far. I ordered the large size for my 50 lb Pyrenees/Border Collie. She is tall for her weight, so the large size is perfect for her. I also love that her food and bowls are altogether, so it takes up less space than I was using before. Highly recommend for any pet! Her area is much cleaner now, and she’s more comfortable. Happy customer and happy dog:)
customer_reviews.author: bstanley

customer_reviews.title: Air tight, dog cannot open
customer_reviews.text: This is the most genius product for pets. I didn’t even think about this when I was looking for another storage container for my new puppy. But I also wanted elevated bowls for her, so it was a double benefit. Now, this puppy may be half trash panda. She can find the smallest morsel of food and can open those dog food puzzles with ease. I thought, hmmmm, only a matter of time before she figures out this food container sitting on the flour. She has not even attempted to open it! I don’t think she could. It is definitely air tight. Thinking of getting a bigger one for my other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The large is HUGE.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars based on quality and bang for the buck but the images are misleading. The large is HUGE! Do NOT go by the silhouette man behind the product images...they are sooooo NOT proportionate. I was looking for a portable feeder to travel with and should have gotten the medium. If you filled the large with food, you definitely aren't lifting it. The large IS a great home feeder for my 100lb lab and it's well-made so I'm keeping it but ordering a medium for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Small size is more appropriate for most corgis
customer_reviews.text: We first got the medium size for our 26lb corgi, but it was too tall for him. He still opted to use the water bowl on the floor and refused to eat his food from the elevated food bowl (he is very food driven). I exchanged it for a small and now he uses it without hesitation. I took off a star for the inaccurate description on sizing (he's an average size for a corgi). The product itself seems well built, and it'll be very convenient to store all his stuff when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: s.t.

customer_reviews.title: Storage feeder is attractive and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeding my American Staffordshire with a platform feeder with two bowls that was more appropriate for a Great Dane, the original user. It took up more floor space than this unit, and the feed had to be kept in a separate storage bin. Now I just lift the top and scoop out kibble into the feeding dish. My dog is happy with the height, and adapted readily to the new feeder. Cleaning requires only a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Communicator

customer_reviews.title: Overall great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall. It is the perfect height for my 85lb German Shepherd. He “grazes,” so I fill the bowl (which is very big) up about every 2-3 days. If I had to fill it once or twice a day, I could see this unit becoming a bit of a pain... you have to take the entire “lid” (with both bowls) off to access the food storage... however, for me, this isn’t a big deal at all. Bowls are decent quality stainless, thin but adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for tall dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Great Pyrenees! He wasn't eating his meals previously and my mom had a good thought that it was probably because it hurts to bend down to the floor where his old bowl was. Purchased this and he still doesn't eat right away but he eats quicker than he did before! The storage underneath is awesome too! Before we had old coffee cans on the counter that held his food, but now we can store food in the house but it's confined and stashed away! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline Radzwion

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome. I love it and my dog loves it. So great I don't have to have a huge bag of dog food sitting in the corner of my dining room. The only thing this means though is that I can't buy bigger bags like I normally do. I tend to buy 50 lb + bags at times but that's ok. Its great to have his food hidden and he's happy with it. Super awesome deal. Was so worth the price and the risk of buying it. So heads up anywhere between a 40 to 45 lb bag will fit. Anything bigger will leave food left over in your bag. Hope his helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job But ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok to me. It doesn’t seem to seal as well as it should. I can smell the food even with it closed and the clips down and that bothers me. On a positive it holds a lot of food, I put an entire large bag of puppy food in it and there was room to spare. Filling the food bowl is easy enough. Lastly, and it’s not the fault of the container, my dog doesn’t like to eat or drink out of the stainless bowls. I’ve since bought a different container.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: The USA name after the name Iris is a little misleading. I purchased this because I assumed it was made in the USA. I see on the bottom of the bowls, they are made in India. I have not received a response but I want to ensure these bowls are lead free. Not sure who makes the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Coulda been great! But one minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for an elevated feeder. The storage is great and seals well but the handle system is not built well and falls off every time they are unlocked. It seems the holes are not deep enough or the handle inserts are not long enough to properly allow the handle to stay in place and swivel up to release the handle locking mechanism. I would have given this 5 stars but I feel the necessity to have a good handle system heavily relies on this products functionality and the lack there of really drops the products rating.
customer_reviews.author: Scot S.

customer_reviews.title: Need bigger bowls made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, we liked but this medium was too tall for our dogs. It showed in the small had same size bowls which it doesn't. They are very tiny single cat size bowls our dogs wouldn't even use, we returned both med & small, too bad it's sturdy and well made would of been great. Made in USA a huge plus. Other than bowl size we didn't like was the bowls were made outside USA.
customer_reviews.author: lmac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food storage
customer_reviews.text: I have a great Dane and this is perfect for her so she isn't having to go so low to get her food. The storage container is large enough that we can put an entire large bag of food into it. The bowls come out and are dishwasher safe. And the top its pretty easy to clean as well. If you have a sloppy fog like I do then you definitely want to clean the lid because food and water tend to get under the bowls. Price was great for this as well. Will be getting another one for outside soon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it says it will. It's sturdy, easy to clean and hold dog food. It's just a pain to open to get food out while trying to hold the bowls in the lid. You have to empty the water bowl every time you want to open the lid. I just didn't think the operations through before I purchased. My fault!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I always buy the biggest bag of Hills Science diet because I have two large dogs and this fits the entire bag! Easy to take apart, I normally will only undo one side for feedings and it works without food going everywhere! This makes feeding so convenient, and it looks nice and neat! The dogs used to push their bowls around but they cant with this.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not the best dog feeder
customer_reviews.text: My two issues with this feeder container are the following: 1) Water accumulates under the bowls; I use one for food and one for water, so it also accumulates under the food bowl. 2) Bowl size isn't standard. I can't interchange it with. The bowls are not made in the USA, rather in India. Personally, I think you would be better off building your own feeder and/or looking at other commercial options.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Go up to next size/ Get large for medium dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Seals wonderful and airtight, great product and exactly what I was looking. Perfect for packing on the go, and durable. I wish I had gotten the large it’s smaller then expected even after I read measurements and made sure it was right height. Small bag of food doesn’t fit all in so have I have left over for a few weeks using bag, needed to get a large but don’t like the returning process so I’ll make due.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: While the overall functionality of this is great, the top of the feeder where the bowls ...
customer_reviews.text: While the overall functionality of this is great, the top of the feeder where the bowls sit leaves something to be desired. The small finger openings which are meant to allow easy removal of the bowls also allows water & food to collect in the bottom, which I learned the hard way. Not only did I have to clean the top of the feeder when I removed the bowls, but I also had to clean the floor where the stagnant water that was in the bottom of the lid dripped off of the bottom of the bowls when I lifted them out. Otherwise, I (and my dog) love this.
customer_reviews.author: August Muse

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, shipping was fast, nicely packaged. Sometimes our dogs eat out of it, other times they prefer to eat from the bowls on the floor. All our dogs are medium and large size (50-115lbs) and the large-size feeder is a perfect height for them all, we also purchased a medium size, but the bowls are fairly small for their big snouts, although the momma eats and drinks water from the medium-sized feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Geri K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I rate the product 5 stars because it seems convenient enough not to put a strain on my dogs neck while they're eating or drinking. I even bought a size medium for my other dog. However I would like to add I would give Amazon 3 stars on packing. I bought this item new! I received it with dust & dirt on it. It seems like somebody bought it before, opened the original packaging & returned it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a new dog that is part Pomeranian and part Terrier, with unbelievably LONG legs! He looks like he's on stilts! Having the food bowl on the floor was difficult for him so I started looking for elevated feeding solutions. This little feeder is perfect....it holds his dry food in the bottom, and his food and water bowls are at just the perfect height! It's very sturdy and the storage compartment locks securely. Would definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pam E. Owston

customer_reviews.title: This has worked well for our Great Dane puppy
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well for our Great Dane puppy. So far so good! It gets a little messy with her slobbery goodness getting all over the black top of this, but I just have to stay on top of it with cleaning and it's fine. Container holds the 30lb bag of dog food with no problems and so far no bugs have been able to get into it. We have used this for a couple of months now. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Man Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my puppy seems to enjoy knocking his bowls over and spilling water all over the carpet multiple times a day. I believe this will deter that since once it is filled with food, it seems heavy enough to keep him from knocking the whole thing over. It is also nice to have raised bowls for him. He is a ~30 lb 8 month old mini aussie and the medium size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Mine had a broken handle :-/
customer_reviews.text: I like this feeder, especially the fact it holds 40lb bag of dog food. I only gave it 3 stars though because the left handle does not stay attached, the prong that is supposed to hold it shut is too short so every time I touch it (which is every time I feed the dogs) it falls off. It is quite a nuisance. A bit cheaply made but overall looks decent and is convenient for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Best bowl riser i could ask for
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this bowl riser because I thought the plastic would look tacky. It really doesn't! The black color is way darker than pictured and hides the food inside. Holds more than 30lbs of Taste of the Wild dog food. I do have to tie my dog up while filling the bowl so he doesn't eat out of the sterilite bin, but it has become routine and is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jpaw1992

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The latch design is perfect as the dog cannot paw at it and unsnap it (snaps come up, not down). Fits exactly a 40 lb. bag of dog food. Great height for taller dog. We have a tall greyhound and this is great for him. Like the smokey color - you don't notice the food stored inside, but you can see the food line, which helps remind you of when you need more food (unless you are on an auto delivery, which is even better! ;D). Stainless steel bowls are good quality and do not rust even when water gets spilled under them and sits there.
customer_reviews.author: MireilleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I don’t use it for food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 65lb Goldendoodle and needs a bigger container for her food. I bought this with the intention to put her brush, shampoo, training things, etc. in. On the storage-I wouldn’t put my dogs food in it because I don’t think it fully seals, other than that, it is pretty easy to take the top off (with food and water in the bowls) and put stuff into the storage. 5 stars because it’s great for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: amazonpurchaser

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item!. Perfect for my 80 pounds german Shepperd.. sombodrtable... even my mixed breed, medium sized dog uses it more than the one that is right for the size... Beware of the recommended matt. It will not protect the floor if you buy the large size.. you are pretty much placing this on top of a matt to about this from touching the floor. When the dog drinks water from it, it will go everywhere still unless you do what I did.. do not fill it up to the top.
customer_reviews.author: AmaFan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feeder.
customer_reviews.text: Came with rubber feet for slippery floors. Very well built. Holds a 25 lb. bag of kibble easily. Did come with one small piece broken off at the corner. Not an issue for me, I put that in the back and it didn't affect the stability of the base at all. My dog hates it since she actually has to stand up to eat instead of laying around her bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo feeder and food storage for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for my 60 lb German Shepherd mix to eat and drink from without giving him bloat or causing him to vomit his food back up. The box holds a full 33 lb bag of food (which is all I buy at a time anyways). The lid is very easy to remove when fully loaded with food and water. I would like another hole to help remove the water dish when it’s full, but that’s in no way a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I have 50# lab mix. Previously I was packing her travel food in gallon zipper bags and using collapsible bowls. This is so much better. I have made several trips with her using this. Built in elevated feeder, easy to give her water in the car. Stores about a week's worth of food for my dog. Easy to wash. I throw the bowls in the dishwasher, hand wash the rest. I was a little hesitant to buy it at first, but I am so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sara AKB

customer_reviews.title: this is super handy. everything from the little rim around the ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this is super handy. everything from the little rim around the edge (for slopy drinkers who slosh water everywhere), to the airtight feature, to the little hole/indention that makes it easier to get the bowls out, to the size... actually if it was just a bit bigger that'd awesome as it doesn't hold 50lbs (which they make clear so I am not dinging them for it)... in general, great attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my 80 lb German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my 80 lb German Shepherd. I think she appreciates not having to strain her neck while eating (even though that doesn't last long!). I like how you can store the food right there too. I don't use one of the two bowls as my dog would empty that in less than one sitting but maybe I'll use it for something else, who knows?
customer_reviews.author: D. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: does keep food fresh
customer_reviews.text: would buy again, food stays air tight and fresh i buy the large 35 lb bags and there is still room to spare in the box once i empty the bag love not having to deal with dog food bags the height is perfect for my 2 pitbulls to eat from the bowls, but i use both bowls for food because i have a separate larger water dispenser i feel that the bowls might be a bit small to use for water since they drink more than they eat overall im very happy with this purchase, i bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.author: Julia Potoret

customer_reviews.title: This is great.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don't really do it justice, this is pretty nice. I got the large for my black lab and the bowles are big, the height is great, and it comes with rubber feet. It does say right on it holds 47 lbs which is just not true, my 31.1 lbs bag I buy fills it to the top, but works great for me and it looked nicer than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Works good but bowls need to be larger
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd, he is a tall boy, so I ordered the large. It seems to be the right height but the food bowls are too small and he has a hard time getting the food out of them, I have to keep spooning the food from the side. He eats it all then I have to add more. Think the bowls need to be larger for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Yay, my Byren can eat comfortably
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was too high, but as can be seen from the picture, it's just perfect for Byren! He previously had a large Neater Feeder Express, but he had to bend his head too low and I didn't like that. Now Byren can eat and drink comfortably! And, another plus is that, I can storage his food in there.
customer_reviews.author: NEscano

customer_reviews.title: Best fur baby purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these when they were on the Deal of the Day list. Best purchase for my fur babies. I have two Golden Retrievers and one German Shepherd. It's the perfect height to help with their digestion and the bottom storage holds a 20lb bag of food. Easy to clean and sturdy. My goofballs have knocked it over a few times (when it's empty) and they're fine. If you're thinking about purchasing, do it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pigott

customer_reviews.title: Great bin at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very cool airtight product. i purchased one for me and my gf incase we came upon any strays. i have a mixture of dog and cat food and it still seems moderatly fresh after some recent traveling. the bowls are great, but rattle, so I attached sticky magnets to the bottom of the bowls so I could drive without them popping out. yes the bowls sit askew on anything but grass, but no big deal. I would recommend this to anyone with pets or a soft heart. whenever I do take my dog places its nice to have this easy set up
customer_reviews.author: Grimlock602

customer_reviews.title: Stores loads of food, easy to clean and does NOT attract insects! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! The seal is very good on this container and it keeps the dog food fresh. I love that it's able to hold about 35 pounds of dog food with ease! It's the perfect height to be healthy for my dog. The proper height for eating and drinking is crucial to reducing neck strain and pain as well as gas. Believe it or not..the height makes a world of difference. Buy and see the enjoyment in your dog's face! Easy to clean and doesn't attract insects either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Good design, function
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog to keep my cats away from eating her food. Good design except it gets dirty very quickly. I like the food storage underneath to keep the food from getting stale and easy access. I wish it had a better design for the water not getting into the food though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F

customer_reviews.title: we have 2 great danes, and we take them on the road ...
customer_reviews.text: we have 2 great danes, and we take them on the road with us often. This bowl is amazing, we actually bought a 2nd one. We store food in one and all of the other dog supplies in the other while we are on the road! Cleans up easy and the food stays fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Chastain

customer_reviews.title: ~Great Product!~
customer_reviews.text: the packaging said it would hold a 42 lb bag of dog food.. i put in a 40 lb bag and still had food left in the bag. So guess-timating, i think it would hold a 35-36 maybe 38 lb bag of food comfortably. Other than this minor setback, i find this is very convenient and a great product for my black lab! it makes it easier on her neck and back to eat since it's elevated and she's not straining to eat. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great size and idea
customer_reviews.text: Great size and idea. The 6 month old lab puppies love it, and I like that I can scoop their food out of the container and into the bowl. Easily solves the problem of where to store their 30 lb bag of food. The only issue is that it's big and I haven't found the perfect spot for it in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: newigwam

customer_reviews.title: Lotus approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new rescue dog Lotus. She is a medium sized flat coated retriever. I bought it after reading several positive customer reviews. I must say they were spot on! It's easy to clean and stores 16 lbs easily. I would definitely buy this product again. May even get one for my cats!!!
customer_reviews.author: J-LO

customer_reviews.title: I do like this elevated feeder with the abilitu to store food
customer_reviews.text: I do like this elevated feeder with the abilitu to store food. It does seem well made. That being said...i personally think its poorly designed. I have a separate 5 gallon water bowl so i only use this for dog good. I really wished it had a handle on one end and a hinge on the other. I discovered its a bit of a pain to take the entire lid off to get to the food and then replace the lid. I would defintely not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderingjo

customer_reviews.title: This is great for space saving and keeping everything together
customer_reviews.text: This is great for space saving and keeping everything together. It holds my 25.3lb bag of dog food with room to spare. My only complaint is that it's a little bit tall for my dogs to eat out of. Because I got this more for storage than raised eating it isn't a deal breaker for me but if they could maybe make it a little shorter and wider that would be great that way it holds larger bags of food but accommodates Medium-Large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: design flaw...
customer_reviews.text: we quit using after just 2 weeks. Our sloppy drinker splashes water everywhere. Do you know where that water goes? Underneath the bowls. Then it festers and becomes a slimy mess of dog slobber, water and bits of food. Then we decided to just use it to store dog food, but it doesn't hold a 44 lb bag (like the big huge ones from BJ's or Sam's Club) Now it's just taking up space in the garage. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: I like my dogs (5) to have their bowls elevated because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to solve 2 problems- storage and elevation. I like my dogs (5) to have their bowls elevated because they can swallow easier- less choking. I needed separate storage for different diets. It worked well, until....my 3 year old chow hound started chewing on the edges to get to the food. I then had to move the containers into the closet after they ate- a problem when they are storing many pounds of food. So i will keep them for the elevation and go back to Vittle Vaults for more secured storage. But if you don't have chewers or dogs with voracious appetites, they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie P.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing i dislike is that water/food particles seep under the dish where ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i dislike is that water/food particles seep under the dish where the dip is and rots. It smells terrible and i have to wash the whole thing out about once a week. Also on occasion the food storage inside has molded all of my food so i stopped storing food in it. My animals enjoy eating at the higher level i purchased 2 one for cats and one for dog.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Currier

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is described. I have a medium to large dog (60 lbs) and the large is perfect size. Wasn't super stoked about this big thing sitting in our dining room but the functionality of it outweighs it matching my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect! Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight, easy to clean, and the perfect height for our Labrador retriever. At first I was disappointed by the limited color choices, but decided to give it a try anyway. Turns out the black and gray is perfect, as I will be adding daisy wall stickers to this feeder for our fur baby, Daisy! (I will try and post a photo when it’s finished.)
customer_reviews.author: Dutton Clan

customer_reviews.title: item incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item from a different seller before and it came with 2 steel bowls, like pictured in the photos. this item looked as though it had been used before. not happy at all! i still haven't heard anything from the seller. DO NOT BUY! ITEM not as described or pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Felten

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to get my husband on board with buying this
customer_reviews.text: After building our own version of this with scrap wood, and having the whole thing get greasy and moldy from the food residue, I was so happy to get my husband on board with buying this. We bought the large version for our lab-hound mix. It the perfect height for her, and we obviously no longer have a mold issue as the unit is plastic. Our dog, having lab in her, is a compulsive eater and will break into anything she can to get a treat, but she has not yet attempted that with this unit. I'm not sure if it seals the smell in, or if she is just behaving herself, but it's working for us regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia O'H

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought a larger one but it still does what it's supposed to. I like the storage for things I don't use daily. It would be a pain to keep food in there. Somehow my dog always manages to get water under the bowl, I haven't figured that out but it makes a mess and the bowl floats.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McCune

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 months GSD loves this feeder! It is the right height and he never has to reach for the bowl on the floor. It also improves his eating and swallowing. It also sort of prevents my other 11lb toy fox terrier from stealing his food! Haha! I actually use this feeder to store my cat's food because I have both a 50LB and 20LB food container for my dogs. It is airtight like it is stated in the product description. It is also easy for me to get the food out for my cat. This is an excellent product with a great price. I would recommend this product to anybody who has big family members. :)
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Raised feeder
customer_reviews.text: Product returned looked like solid bottom but it was see-through took couple weeks after contacting Amazon to get it returned did not think description was adequate but seller did return my money and acept the product back In original packing
customer_reviews.author: ginny larrabee

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is having to completely remove the top get to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a dog I recently adopted. Both my dogs, a boxer and a pug/beagle mix, use this and it fits them well. It's really handy to have the food right where their bowls are. The only thing I don't like is having to completely remove the top get to the food. This can be really tricky if there is water in the bowl. It's great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price  sturdy and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have a taller dog think lab height and fits him great and buy 25 lbs bags this fits it all and it’s very convenient with the removable dog bowls . I bought a scoop would be great if it came with one .
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Short of perfection given the cheap bowls that comes with it. Given the already affordable price, upgrading the bowls and raising the price accordingly still would've been a deal. I have a 7 month old Ridgeback and it's just right for him. Best part about this is the food storage below. Also I don't have to worry about him knocking his food bowl over anymore. He's tried with this and failed. He did skip a meal or two b/c he couldn't knock it over but hunger got the best of him and he got with the program.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaWave

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought
customer_reviews.text: I resisted buying this for awhile - I had the (mistaken) idea it would be annoying to open and lift for every meal. It's so much nicer this way. Way less likely to get knocked over, and no big food container junking up my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Superior dog feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height for my two 60 lb standard poodles. The seal is excellent and very weather proof. The plastic is very sturdy. The food stays nice and fresh; can still see the oils on it two weeks later when you're at the bottom of the bucket. It easily holds the whole 30 lb bag of food. My only con: if placing water in the steel dishes, it will dribble over the sides and then the bowls are floating on a layer of water, which does comically make them spin while the dogs attempt to eat or drink. But, I have just taken them out and feed/water directly from the depressions. Worth every penny spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Happy shopper
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like this. I have a boxer. If it was any taller it would be to tall, but she can reach the entire bowl. I like that it is large enough to fit a large bag of dog food. The list is easy to remove to add food to her bowl. It seems to be made well. I would buy other products from this company and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mel_dyh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality; easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. It's attractive and is actually smaller than it looks in the picture. Holds a 30 pound bag of food with no problem. The top is sealed so that any water spilled doesn't leak into the food storage section. Easy to clean and of course the two bowls lift out for easy filling and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Colt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our lid has indentions instead of holes for the water bowl and food bowl so the food in the container stays dry and will not mold. The large size fits the giant bag of dog food from my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: L.N.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage,  tiny bowls, make sure you have extra water!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my old Siberian Husky. It holds a bag of food. The bowls are very small though. PLEASE, PLEASE make sure you have a 2nd water source!!!!!!! My guy will empty this water bowl 2 times a day easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Work

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked, but works fine.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived cracked at the corner, but I ended up duct taping it because I didn't want to deal with the hassle of returning it and waiting for a new one. Otherwise, this is a nice container that serves dual purpose and saves space in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any dog. At home or travel.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing we purchased for our dog. Doubles as a storage bin for regular use of food or in the go stores treats, toys and leashes. Good height. Sterile and easy to clean. We put paper towel under water dish to soak up extra water that gets under dish. Really happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage and feed in one
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our large (75 lb) mixed breed dog. I love that I don't have to store the food in a separate location. It's neat and easy to open to feed. We only use it for food so don't really need two bowls, but perhaps in the summer, we will put ice in the other side. We were so happy with this that we ordered a small one for out cats too.
customer_reviews.author: shopr

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Keeps food and water off the ground, we have a 70lb pit bull and an Italian Mastiff. So this was a great investment for us, and a better way for our dogs to eat. It is the perfect height for our pit, and since our mastiff is still a puppy, he will grow into it. But the best part is, it holds 40+ pounds of food in each air tight container. The large bowls that come with the set, sit on top of the lid, and so there is no leakage the water into the food, unlike some other food/bowl holders out there.
customer_reviews.author: cakes

customer_reviews.title: Great for misbehaving cats who insist on spilling and moving ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for misbehaving cats who insist on spilling and moving bowls in anger and manipulation. If you have an evil spoiled cat who likes to bang around her bowl when you're 5 minutes late feeding her ungrateful 20 lb personality, then this is the bowl set for you. Plenty of room for lots of good and water for large, demanding cats.
customer_reviews.author: Private Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution for my older dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 year old isn't strong enough to bend over for her food without her legs slipping a bit on the wood floor. We put a small carpet next to the bowl but she would move around and step off. This container is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: GinVin

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, good quality, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I thought since I'm ordering my second one of these that I should take the time to write a review. We've had one for years and now need one for our second dog as well. Combining the improved comfort for the dogs of eating our of elevated bowls with all that storage area is genius. And the quality is fantastic for the price. Our older container is still in perfect conditions after years of use. The clips are really sturdy, bowls and plastic are good quality, BPA free...altogether I really can't say enough good things about this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anne

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and pictured. Very well made. Dishes are removable for cleaning. They clean easy and are machine safe. The only flaw is its hard to take the lid off to get the food when the water bowl is full. But this greatly improved the feeding and drinking of my dogs. Perfect size for a lab and rot. I recommend this over floor feeding!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the storage container I had for keeping dog food and was looking for a dual purpose feeder/container. This is perfect. It is quite tall for a feeder --my Annie (an 80 lb lab) hardly has to bend her head down to eat. The bowls are roomy and sturdy. Best of all, the very large bag of dog food fits in the bottom of the container, which also keeps it fresh. It takes some getting used to -- lifting the bowl tray to get to the food and not spilling the water -- and keeping Annie from eating out of the storage part -- but overall, this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Big Suze

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. My dogs are always knocking over feeding dishes or knocking into them spilling things but with this one the weight of the food within helps stabilize the unit. Its very hard to tip this. It also holds over 40 lbs of food which I really like. The bowls are large enough for big dogs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Browser

customer_reviews.title: My Shepherd is Happy With It - and that's all I care about!
customer_reviews.text: The main thing is it works well for my German Shepherd who is having hind leg weakness. She stands on carpet and this is the perfect height for her to eat without having to hang her head down. Easy to remove lid with water bowl. Bowls are lightweight but working out just fine. No complaints. The plastic container stays in place on the linoleum floor with some kibble weighting it down. It's a great travel device for an RV when you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeinSC

customer_reviews.title: REALLY like this! The puppy is too small for it ...
customer_reviews.text: REALLY like this! The puppy is too small for it right now (she's a lab, 3.5 months old, just so you can judge size) but it will be perfect by about 4-5 months old. It seems well made and I like how easy it's going to be to clean out the top. Love the stainless bowls and the snap on lid.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Textile Collector

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for out pupp, keeps food fresh and ants out.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. We actually forgot we had the food storage underneath and the seasonal ants made an appearance and got into the puppy food. Then I put it in this. No more issues. It's also a lot less messy when the kids help feed her. I also like that she doesn't have to eat right off the floor. It's elevated.
customer_reviews.author: JaxStraw

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I like that my dogs don't have to eat off the floor but what I love most is that the tote is very portable so when I take my dogs with me I can easily fit their food, chewies, toys and other supplies in the tote. This makes traveling with them much easier with everything all in one location!
customer_reviews.author: Feathery

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Way better than an in store purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Great Dane mix (26" at the shoulders tall) and a Catahoula and and this is PERFECT. And I love that it has a storage area for the food underneath. We don't put water in the bowls, only food, because we've done that in the past and food and water mix underneath the bowl and can get moldy, quick. But it works for what we wanted and if I ever need another one, I'll definitely be purchasing again! Wayyyyy cheaper than an in store option and a way better quality/design!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after doing some extensive searching. And after considering all the options available this is the one I chose. I had a bowl placed on top of a crate to provide some height for my dog while eating and he would continually knock his bowl over and scatter food on the floor. This eliminates that and it facilitates his eating. He has a separate bowl for water so I split his food into the two bowls and he thinks he's getting twice as much. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ana W.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest or prettiest but does a great job for the money! I recommend it. I can store my dog’s food and she is now able to eat without straining her old neck.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, spacious, good height, quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this feeder so far, feels very sturdy, well made in the USA, great height for our boxer, spacious storage for food, seals well without smell attracting animals as it's kept outside. Capacity for storage shows 64 cups in the description, which seems accurate. However, stickers on the product showed 47lb capacity, which seems incorrect. We buy 44lb bags of food and there's still 7-8 lbs left in the bag after filling the container. This doesn't affect my rating since the description on the product page seems close and height/size are appropriate. Bowls are truly 2qt, but be prepared to fill water often for big dogs, I wish larger bowls were an option.
customer_reviews.author: T Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for helping us tidy up the dog's feeding area -and- making feeding a little faster and easier. The medium height works well for both our rescues (45 lb lab mix and 27 lb Griffon mix). The top, with bowls, latches securely but pops off easily to access the food inside and the dry dog food seems to be staying nice and fresh. Several dog-loving friends have commented on what a neat idea this is. I originally thought it would be handy for short trips with the pets, but like it at home every day too!
customer_reviews.author: Kay in TX

customer_reviews.title: Right size and height for cats
customer_reviews.text: Bought the small elevated feeder for an elderly cat. The feeder might be "small" for dogs but definitely a good size for cats. The feeder has just the right height. It is sturdy, and the storage, with cat food added, provides extra weight. Overall I am happy with this feeder and so is the cat.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Water stays separate from her dry food-- we leave both out all day (she's very good at self-regulating her intake)
customer_reviews.text: This is just genius. Our 50 # Retriever mix uses it all the time. She doesn't have to bend down to eat and we can store extra food in the container below. Water stays separate from her dry food-- we leave both out all day (she's very good at self-regulating her intake). Works great for traveling as well. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teri S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Clever and Handy Design
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy design for storage and use. Just need to remove lid occasionally for a good cleaning. I usually store food inside along in its packaging for it ultimate freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large to giant breed
customer_reviews.text: Love this, elevation and storage together! It is perfect for our Irish wolfhounds. It almost fits the 55lb bag of the local dog food manufacturer we use so if you buy the normal 40lb bags you will have no issues. We love it so much we bought a second one when we got the second dog.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Not Practical
customer_reviews.text: One again, I should have payed attention to the bad reviews before buying. I have had the same problem as others—this feeder leaks water under both bowls. If you don’t mind emptying the base every day then this works well, however this is not practical for most. I have since switched to a high capacity water dispenser and use one of the bowls supplied with this as a food bowl and couldn’t be happier. Sometimes simple is best. 2 stars are because it is very sturdy with quality locking handles and stores the food well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Compact food and water container. I purchased the medium size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to have. I purchased two for our two cats. These eliminate different bowls and have storage too. They each came in their own boxes and were not in protected wrap. They both would have fit in one box!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easier than expected
customer_reviews.text: We love this container! Our medium to large size dog has no problem using it, height wise. The food has stayed fresh and getting food out of the container to refill the bowl was not as hard as I thought it’d be at all. Wish it came with a scoop but definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my small dog she is a jack Russell mix. Large is a little too tall but my dog can still eat and drink from it :)
customer_reviews.author: Josey Coston

product_meta.title: IRIS Small Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage
product_meta.description: Color:Black/Smoke| Size:Large| Style:With StorageIRIS Large Elevated Feeder with Airtight Storage, Black are perfect feeders improve your pet's digestion and help reduce neck strain. These elevated feeders incorporate convenient storage capacity under the two stainless steel bowls, kept dry and fresh by an airtight seal and snap-tight latches. Perfect for indoors.
feature_bullets: This elevated feeder improves your pet's digestion and helps reduce neck muscle strain
Each bowl holds 2 quarts of water or food
Includes 2 stainless steel bowls, removable for easy cleaning
The storage space holds up to 64 cups of dry pet food

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
